rstudio
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which rstudio installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using rstudio, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load rstudio/1.3.959-foss-2020a-Java-11-R-4.0.0
```
